Definition: NASA announced that it would delay the launch of the manned spacecraft until the radiation from the solar flares abated.

the storm suddenly abated

this action would not have been sufficient to abate the odour nuisance
Additional_Info:
~subside, die down/away/out, drop off/away, lessen, ease (off), let up, decrease, diminish

~ decrease, lessen, diminish, reduce, lower, moderate, ease, soothe, relieve, dampen
കുറയ്ക്കുക

ശല്യം ഒഴിവാക്കുക

Meaning: without any reduction in intensity or strength
Additional_Info:
the storm was raging unabated

അടങ്ങാത്ത
